app_remove_site_confirm.message: Ask yourself: "Does unblocking this site help me get closer to my goals, or is it just a momentary distraction that will cost me lost progress?"

app_list_empty.message:
Hello, focus guardian! 🌟
All worlds are open to you for now.
Is this the land of distraction you want FocusGuardian to protect?

quote_1.message: 🧙‍♂️ "It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities" - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, J.K. Rowling

quote_2.message: 🍃 "Even the smallest person can change the course of the future" - The Fellowship of the Ring, J.R.R. Tolkien
quote_2.description: Quote from Lord of the Rings

quote_3.message: 🌌 "Your focus determines your reality" - Star Wars: The Phantom Menace

quote_4.message: 🥋 "The successful warrior is the average person with laser-like focus" - Bruce Lee

quote_5.message: 🕶️ "There's a difference between knowing the path and walking the path" - The Matrix

quote_6.message: 💡 "Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration" - Thomas Edison

quote_7.message: 🔍 "I think and think for months and years. Ninety-nine times, the conclusion is false" - Albert Einstein

quote_8.message: 🗡️ "It's dangerous to go distracted! Stay sharp" - Legend of Zelda

quote_9.message: 🌌 "Do. Or do not. There is no try" - Yoda, Star Wars

quote_10.message: 🥊 "It ain't about how hard you hit. It's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward" - Rocky

quote_11.message: 👀 "Focus on what truly matters" - Distracted Boyfriend

quote_14.message: 🐸 "Feels good to achieve your goals" - Pepe the Frog

quote_15.message: 🎥 "Just do it! Don't let your dreams be dreams" - Shia LaBeouf
